AddClientToBlackList.title: AddClientToBlackList
AddClientToBlackList.summary: Adds a client to the blacklist of a Cloud Parallel File Storage (CPFS) file system and revokes the write access from the client. The blacklist serves as an I/O fence.

ApplyAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: ApplyAutoSnapshotPolicy
ApplyAutoSnapshotPolicy.summary: Applies an automatic snapshot policy to one or more file systems.

ApplyDataFlowAutoRefresh.title: ApplyDataFlowAutoRefresh
ApplyDataFlowAutoRefresh.summary: Adds AutoRefresh configurations to a dataflow.

AttachVscToFilesystems.title: AttachVscToFilesystems
AttachVscToFilesystems.summary: Associates the VSC device with the file system.

CancelAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: CancelAutoSnapshotPolicy
CancelAutoSnapshotPolicy.summary: Removes automatic snapshot policies from one or more file systems.

CancelDataFlowAutoRefresh.title: CancelDataFlowAutoRefresh
CancelDataFlowAutoRefresh.summary: Cancels the AutoRefresh configuration for a dataflow.

CancelDataFlowTask.title: CancelDataFlowTask
CancelDataFlowTask.summary: Cancels a batch or streaming task that is in the Pending or Execute state.

CancelDirQuota.title: CancelDirQuota
CancelDirQuota.summary: Cancels the directory quota of a file system.

CancelFilesetQuota.title: CancelFilesetQuota
CancelFilesetQuota.summary: Cancels the quota set for a fileset.

CancelLifecycleRetrieveJob.title: CancelLifecycleRetrieveJob
CancelLifecycleRetrieveJob.summary: Cancels a running data retrieval task.

CancelRecycleBinJob.title: CancelRecycleBinJob
CancelRecycleBinJob.summary: Cancels a running job of the recycle bin.

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which a file system belongs.

CreateAccessRule.title: CreateAccessRule
CreateAccessRule.summary: Creates a rule for a permission group.

CreateDataFlow.title: CreateDataFlow
CreateDataFlow.summary: Creates a dataflow for a Cloud Parallel File Storage (CPFS) file system and source storage.

CreateDir.title: CreateDir
CreateDir.summary: Creates a directory in a file system.

CreateLogAnalysis.title: CreateLogAnalysis
CreateLogAnalysis.summary: Dumps the logs of a General-purpose NAS file system to Simple Log Service.

CreateProtocolMountTarget.title: CreateProtocolMountTarget
CreateProtocolMountTarget.summary: Creates an export directory for a protocol service.

CreateProtocolService.title: CreateProtocolService
CreateProtocolService.summary: Creates a protocol service for a Cloud Parallel File Storage (CPFS) file system. The creation takes about 5 to 10 minutes.

CreateRecycleBinDeleteJob.title: CreateRecycleBinDeleteJob
CreateRecycleBinDeleteJob.summary: Creates a job to permanently delete a file or directory from the recycle bin.

CreateRecycleBinRestoreJob.title: CreateRecycleBinRestoreJob
CreateRecycleBinRestoreJob.summary: Restores a file or directory from the recycle bin.

DeleteAccessRule.title: DeleteAccessRule
DeleteAccessRule.summary: Deletes a rule from a permission group.

DeleteLogAnalysis.title: DeleteLogAnalysis
DeleteLogAnalysis.summary: Disables log dumping for a General-purpose NAS file system.

DeleteProtocolMountTarget.title: DeleteProtocolMountTarget
DeleteProtocolMountTarget.summary: Deletes an export directory of a protocol service.

DeleteProtocolService.title: DeleteProtocolService
DeleteProtocolService.summary: Deletes a protocol service of a Cloud Parallel File Storage (CPFS) file system.

DeleteSnapshot.title: DeleteSnapshot
DeleteSnapshot.summary: Deletes a snapshot or cancels a snapshot that is being created.

DescribeAccessPoint.title: DescribeAccessPoint
DescribeAccessPoint.summary: Queries the details of an access point.

DescribeAccessPoints.title: DescribeAccessPoints
DescribeAccessPoints.summary: Queries a list of access points.

DescribeAccessRules.title: DescribeAccessRules
DescribeAccessRules.summary: Queries the information about rules in a permission group.

DescribeBlackListClients.title: DescribeBlackListClients
DescribeBlackListClients.summary: Queries the status of clients in the blacklist of a Cloud Parallel File Storage (CPFS) file system.

DescribeDataFlowSubTasks.title: DescribeDataFlowSubTasks
DescribeDataFlowSubTasks.summary: Queries data flow subtasks in batches.

DescribeDataFlowTasks.title: DescribeDataFlowTasks
DescribeDataFlowTasks.summary: Queries the details of dataflow tasks.

DescribeDataFlows.title: DescribeDataFlows
DescribeDataFlows.summary: Queries the dataflows of a CPFS file system.

DescribeDirQuotas.title: DescribeDirQuotas
DescribeDirQuotas.summary: Queries the directory quotas of a file system.

DescribeFileSystemStatistics.title: DescribeFileSystemStatistics
DescribeFileSystemStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics of file systems that are owned by the current account.

DescribeFilesets.title: DescribeFilesets
DescribeFilesets.summary: Queries the information about created filesets.

DescribeFilesystemsVscAttachInfo.title: DescribeFilesystemsVscAttachInfo
DescribeFilesystemsVscAttachInfo.summary: Queries information about virtual storage channels associated with a file system.

DescribeLogAnalysis.title: DescribeLogAnalysis
DescribeLogAnalysis.summary: Queries the log dump information configured in log analysis.

DescribeMountedClients.title: DescribeMountedClients
DescribeMountedClients.summary: Queries the clients on which a file system is mounted.

DescribeNfsAcl.title: DescribeNfsAcl
DescribeNfsAcl.summary: Queries whether the NFS ACL feature is enabled for a file system.

DescribeProtocolMountTarget.title: DescribeProtocolMountTarget
DescribeProtocolMountTarget.summary: Queries the export directories of a protocol service.

DescribeProtocolService.title: DescribeProtocolService
DescribeProtocolService.summary: Queries the information about protocol services.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions in which File Storage NAS is available.

DescribeSmbAcl.title: DescribeSmbAcl
DescribeSmbAcl.summary: Queries the information about the access control list (ACL) feature of a Server Message Block (SMB) file system that resides in an Active Directory (AD) domain.

DescribeSnapshots.title: DescribeSnapshots
DescribeSnapshots.summary: Queries the information about one or more snapshots of a file system.

DescribeStoragePackages.title: DescribeStoragePackages
DescribeStoragePackages.summary: You can call the DescribeStoragePackages operation to query the list of storage plans.

DescribeZones.title: DescribeZones
DescribeZones.summary: Queries all zones in a region and the file system types that are supported in each zone.

DetachVscFromFilesystems.title: DetachVscFromFilesystems
DetachVscFromFilesystems.summary: Unassociates a VSC device from a file system.

DisableAndCleanRecycleBin.title: DisableAndCleanRecycleBin
DisableAndCleanRecycleBin.summary: Disables and empties the recycle bin of a General-purpose NAS file system.

DisableNfsAcl.title: DisableNfsAcl
DisableNfsAcl.summary: Disables the NFS ACL feature for a file system.

DisableSmbAcl.title: DisableSmbAcl
DisableSmbAcl.summary: Disables the access control list (ACL) feature for a Server Message Block (SMB) file system that resides in an Active Directory (AD) domain.

EnableNfsAcl.title: EnableNfsAcl
EnableNfsAcl.summary: Enables the NFS ACL feature for a file system.

EnableRecycleBin.title: EnableRecycleBin
EnableRecycleBin.summary: Enables the recycle bin feature for a file system.

EnableSmbAcl.title: EnableSmbAcl
EnableSmbAcl.summary: Enables the access control list (ACL) feature for a Server Message Block (SMB) file system that resides in an Active Directory (AD) domain.

GetDirectoryOrFileProperties.title: GetDirectoryOrFileProperties
GetDirectoryOrFileProperties.summary: Queries whether a directory contains files that are stored in the Infrequent Access (IA) or Archive storage class, or whether a file is stored in the IA or Archive storage class.

GetFileset.title: GetFileset
GetFileset.summary: Queries the information about the created fileset.

GetProtocolMountTarget.title: GetProtocolMountTarget
GetProtocolMountTarget.summary: Query the export directory information of the protocol service

GetRecycleBinAttribute.title: GetRecycleBinAttribute
GetRecycleBinAttribute.summary: Queries the recycle bin configurations of a General-purpose NAS file system.

ListDirectoriesAndFiles.title: ListDirectoriesAndFiles
ListDirectoriesAndFiles.summary: Queries the infrequently-accessed files in a specified directory of a General-purpose NAS file system and the subdirectories that contain the files.

ListRecentlyRecycledDirectories.title: ListRecentlyRecycledDirectories
ListRecentlyRecycledDirectories.summary: Queries the directories that are recently deleted.

ListRecycleBinJobs.title: ListRecycleBinJobs
ListRecycleBinJobs.summary: Queries the jobs of the recycle bin.

ModifyAccessPoint.title: ModifyAccessPoint
ModifyAccessPoint.summary: Modifies the information about an access point.

ModifyAccessRule.title: ModifyAccessRule
ModifyAccessRule.summary: Modifies a rule in a permission group.

ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicy
ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicy.summary: An automatic snapshot policy is modified. After you modify an automatic snapshot policy that is applied to a file system, the modification immediately applies to subsequent snapshots that are created for the file system.

ModifyDataFlow.title: ModifyDataFlow
ModifyDataFlow.summary: Modifies the attributes of a dataflow.

ModifyDataFlowAutoRefresh.title: ModifyDataFlowAutoRefresh
ModifyDataFlowAutoRefresh.summary: Modifies an AutoRefresh configuration of a dataflow.

ModifyFileSystem.title: ModifyFileSystem
ModifyFileSystem.summary: Modifies the description of a file system.

ModifyProtocolMountTarget.title: ModifyProtocolMountTarget
ModifyProtocolMountTarget.summary: Modifies the export directory parameters of a protocol service. Only the description can be modified. The virtual private cloud (VPC) ID and vSwitch ID cannot be changed. To change these IDs, you must delete the export directory and create a new one.

ModifyProtocolService.title: ModifyProtocolService
ModifyProtocolService.summary: Modifies a protocol service. You can modify the description of a protocol service.

ModifySmbAcl.title: ModifySmbAcl
ModifySmbAcl.summary: Updates the information about the access control list (ACL) feature of a Server Message Block (SMB) file system that resides in an Active Directory (AD) domain.

RemoveClientFromBlackList.title: RemoveClientFromBlackList
RemoveClientFromBlackList.summary: Remove the client from the blacklist.

ResetFileSystem.title: ResetFileSystem
ResetFileSystem.summary: Rolls back a file system to a snapshot of the file system.

RetryLifecycleRetrieveJob.title: RetryLifecycleRetrieveJob
RetryLifecycleRetrieveJob.summary: Retries failed a data retrieval task.

SetDirQuota.title: SetDirQuota
SetDirQuota.summary: Creates a directory quota for a file system.

SetFilesetQuota.title: SetFilesetQuota
SetFilesetQuota.summary: Sets the quota for a fileset.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to specified resources. File systems and access points are supported.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Deletes a tag from a specified resource.

UpdateRecycleBinAttribute.title: UpdateRecycleBinAttribute
UpdateRecycleBinAttribute.summary: Modifies the retention period of data in the recycle bin of a file system.

UpgradeFileSystem.title: UpgradeFileSystem
UpgradeFileSystem.summary: Scales up an Extreme NAS file system or a Cloud Parallel File Storage (CPFS) file system.
